mapper.select: select g.nickname,u.avatar,u.uid,case when u.thumbnail is null then u.avatar when u.thumbnail = '' then u.avatar when u.thumbnail != '' then u.thumbnail end as thumbnail from group_user g left join user u on g.uid = u.uid where g.uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and g.gid = #{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and g.status = 1
select nickname,avatar,uid,thumbnail from user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 1
